scripts-descriptions.analyse: Run PHPStan static analysis of the code
scripts-descriptions.preview-src-downgrade: Run Rector in 'dry-run' mode to preview how the src/ folder will be downgraded to PHP 7.2
scripts-descriptions.preview-vendor-downgrade: Run Rector in 'dry-run' mode to preview how the vendor/ folder will be downgraded to PHP 7.2
scripts-descriptions.preview-code-downgrade: Run Rector in 'dry-run' mode to preview how the all code (i.e. src/ + vendor/ folders) will be downgraded to PHP 7.2
scripts-descriptions.ssh-server: SSH into the Lando webserver with the 'Gato GraphQL' demo site
scripts-descriptions.build-server: Initialize the Lando webserver with the 'Gato GraphQL' demo site, for development. To be executed only the first time
scripts-descriptions.start-server: Start the Lando webserver with the 'Gato GraphQL' demo site, for development
scripts-descriptions.destroy-server: Destroy the Lando webserver with the 'Gato GraphQL' demo site
scripts-descriptions.import data: Imports pre-defined data into the DB (posts, users, CPTs, etc)
scripts-descriptions.update-deps: Update the Composer dependencies for the 'Gato GraphQL' demo site
scripts-descriptions.optimize-autoloader: Optimizes the Composer autoloaders for all the plugins installed in the webserver
scripts-descriptions.deoptimize-autoloader: Removes the optimization of the Composer autoloaders for all the plugins installed in the webserver
scripts-descriptions.log-server-errors: Show (on real time) the errors from the Lando webserver
scripts-descriptions.log-server-warnings: Show (on real time) the warnings from the Lando webserver
scripts-descriptions.rebuild-app-and-server: Update the App dependencies (from Composer) and rebuild the Lando webserver
scripts-descriptions.enable-caching: Enable caching for the 'Gato GraphQL' in DEV
scripts-descriptions.disable-caching: Disable caching for the 'Gato GraphQL' in DEV
scripts-descriptions.enable-restrictive-defaults: Use restrictive default values for the Settings
scripts-descriptions.disable-restrictive-defaults: Do not use restrictive default values for the Settings
scripts-descriptions.use-default-restrictive-defaults: Remove the set value, use the default one
scripts-descriptions.delete-settings: Delete the plugin settings from the DB
scripts-descriptions.purge-cache: Purge the cache for the 'Gato GraphQL' in DEV
scripts-descriptions.server-info: Retrieve information from the Lando webserver
scripts-descriptions.validate-monorepo: Validate that version constraints for dependencies are the same for all packages
scripts-descriptions.merge-monorepo: Create the monorepo's composer.json file, containing all dependencies from all packages
scripts-descriptions.propagate-monorepo: Propagate versions from the monorepo's composer.json file to all packages
scripts-descriptions.release-patch: Release a new 'patch' version (xx.xx.PATCH) (bump version, commit, push, tag, revert to 'dev-master', commit, push)
scripts-descriptions.release-minor: Release a new 'minor' version (xx.MINOR.xx) (bump version, commit, push, tag, revert to 'dev-master', commit, push)
scripts-descriptions.release-major: Release a new 'major' version (MAJOR.xx.xx) (bump version, commit, push, tag, revert to 'dev-master', commit, push)
scripts-descriptions.merge-phpstan: Generate a single PHPStan config for the monorepo, invoking the config for the PHPStan config for all packages
scripts-descriptions.upgrade-to-phpunit-10: Run Rector to upgrade PHPUnit tests to v10
scripts-descriptions.build-js: Build all JS packages, blocks and editor scripts from Gato GraphQL
scripts-descriptions.install-deps-build-js: Build all JS packages, blocks and editor scripts from Gato GraphQL, installing all dependencies from npm
